vision.notes: Likely important for foraging and navigation in their tropical to subtropical marine habitats. Inference based on general fish biology and habitat, although specific visual adaptations are unknown from the provided context.

mechanoreception.notes: Lateral line system likely present, enabling detection of water movement and pressure changes. Important for predator avoidance and schooling (if applicable).

chemoreception.notes: Olfaction and taste likely play a role in food detection. General to fish biology.
